title: Quinn doesn't have a recommended boot upgrade because Homeguard was removed.

replies.body: I'll fix that. Sorry Quinn players.
You'll prioritize fixing this none game impact bug while Lucian can't even kill a minon with his ult?

> [{quoted}](name=TheLastShadow45,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=cypOn68Z,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2015-11-26T21:23:21.192+0000)
>
> You'll prioritize fixing this none game impact bug while Lucian can't even kill a minon with his ult?

This bug is fixed by easily adding an item id to the list of essential items for Quinn lol, while Lucian's bug requires code digging and modification.

Don't compare apples to oranges. 

The recommended items is a list that you can just plop a name into (at least I think so) and fixing something like lucian's ult would involve looking into where the ult was coded, look into where the damage vs minions was, and replacing a number. Now that may sound simple, but keep in mind there are probably thousands of lines of code to look through just to find a single line. And if that single line happens to have been removed, they would have to replace the line with a new one.

Coding is not a simple thing. If you really think it is, then you have quite a bit to learn.

Did you know that oranges where classified as apples because apple was a generic term for foreign fruit excluding berries? 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apple_%28symbolism%29

So when someone said you "can't(or shouldn't) compare apples to oranges" it meant you can't compare something general say "Champion" to something specific that is also the general term such as "Rengar" because while Mr. Gar is a champion there isn't a good way to compare him to "champion" other then he is one.

You could of coarse compare champions to minions or Rengar to Kha'zix.

not sure if this is a bug and you're aware of it, but last game we killed {{champion:42}}  with his machine gun activated (is it E ?), and the sound remained around his dead body until he was revived, me and team mates were able to listen to it

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=cypOn68Z,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-26T17:29:24.115+0000)
>
> I'll fix that. Sorry Quinn players.

Thank you friend.
While you're here, how has the recent patch effected Quinn's performance?

Actually a few Champions only have tier 1 boots listed in Recommended. I assume those are for more of the "pick your own tier 2" Champs instead of where they are more heavily emphasized. I don't remember Homeguard specifically ever being in the Recommended, just tier 2 boots.

> [{quoted}](name=Kouga,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=cypOn68Z,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-26T09:12:25.629+0000)
>
> Actually a few Champions only have tier 1 boots listed in Recommended. I assume those are for more of the "pick your own tier 2" Champs instead of where they are more heavily emphasized. I don't remember Homeguard specifically ever being in the Recommended, just tier 2 boots.

As a regular Quinn player I can confirm that before this patch, Berserker's Greaves - Homeguard was the recommended boot upgrade.

Fair enough, I just hadn't paid much attention to the upgrades previously, thank you for correcting me. In that case, that's probably why I've seen it on other Champions that also only have tier 1 boots listed in their Recommended, like Quinn.
